name: 7 Saias
description:
Pomba Gira Gypsy 7 Saias.

A religious entity worshiped in Umbanda, an Afro-Brazilian religion.

This record is part of a documentary work, where I had permission from the Pai de Santo of the house to make some records while the rituals were happening.

2016
Brasil
2200x1467
3,47
